name: Radical Rat: Rocket Returns
description:
To return a lost phone, a group of sewer rats builds a rocket skateboard. Upgrade your board and traverse past falling debris to escape the sewer.

This game was made by Jack and Jesse for the 2021 Global Game Jam. We aren't affiliated with a particular jam site, we just wanted to join in on the fun! Video devlog of the jam here:

A post-jam version 2.0 of R.R.R.R. is coming soon! Some features to expect:

-WebGL bug fixes

-More cosmetics

-Better UI and menus

-Audio bug fixes

-More obstacles

-Improved cutscenes

-More animations

-Upgraded sprites

-A livelier hub

-And more!
